Class School

java.lang.Object
School
public class School
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the School, which is where all our Students are taught and our Instructors work. The class provides all the properties and methods necessary to manage the School's' complex system of Subjects, Courses, Instructors and Students. A School object must have a name, and can also be set to have a maximum number of courses that a student can enrol in (maxEnrollableCourses) and a maximum number of courses that an Instructor can teach (maxAssignableCourses). This two parameters, if not specified in the Configuration File will be 1 by default.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Giovanni Arcudi

    • aDayAtSchool

      public void aDayAtSchool()
      Simulates the events of a day at school, which are the following.
      1. For any topic that does not have an open-for-registration course, creates a new course for that subject to start in 2 days.
      2. Assigns instructors and students to courses:
        • Looks at each course that requires an instructor, and goes through the instructors until you finds one that is free (i.e., not already teaching other courses), and can teach the course. Assigns the Instructor to the Course.
        • Look at each student, if they are free, (i.e., not enrolled in any course) goes through the courses until it finds one that the student can join (e.g., not already full and the student has not got the certificate).
      3. Let the student learn (calls aDayPasses() on each course).
      4. At the end of the day, removes any course that is cancelled or already finished.
        5. /

      5. coursesRefresh

        public void coursesRefresh()
        For any Subject in schoolSubjects that does not have an open-for-registration course, creates a new course that starts in 2 days.

      6. assignInstructorToEachCourse

        public void assignInstructorToEachCourse()
        Iterates over each Course in schoolCourses and assigns an Instructor to the courses that don't have one.

      7. enrolFreeStudents

        public void enrolFreeStudents()
        Iterates over each Student in schoolStudents and, if possible, enrolls them to a new Course

      8. getNumberOfEnrolledCourses

        public int getNumberOfEnrolledCourses​(Student student)
        Returns the number of courses the Student passed as parameter is enrolled in.
        Parameters:
        student - the students we want to know the courses that is enrolled in
        Returns:
        the number of courses a students is enrolled in
